short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Never Forget Tab is a Chrome Extension for the New Tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
-- Never Forget Tab --

By clicking "Add to chrome", I accept and agree to installing the extension and setting chrome new tab search provider to Microsoft Bing as described by the service in terms of use https://neverforgettab.com/terms and Privacy Policy https://neverforgettab.com/privacy

Save your sticky notes in each new tab Sticky ideas and shopping list
